pullRequest.title: #17968 rename service integrations to Apps
pullRequest.bodyText:
Ticket  17968 says:
Most systems that offer integrations like this call it "Apps". We need to refactor our portlet, packaging and naming to call the new Portlet "Apps"
And So I did.. I renamed the whole thing to apps. I got rid of all the uses of the service-integration term.
